hero.title: VideMaison - Your Trusted Partner
hero.subtitle: Professional house clearance, apartment and cleaning services

services.title: Our Services
services.pageSubtitle: Discover our complete range of clearance and cleaning services, tailored to all your needs.

videMailson.intro: Our house clearance service is designed to rid you of all unwanted items, whether following an inheritance, a move, or simply to make space.
videMailson.weOffer: We intervene quickly and efficiently to:
points: Free evaluation of contents to be cleared
Sort items according to their value and condition
Dismantle furniture if necessary
Remove all objects and waste
Manage recycling and waste recovery
videMailson.conclusion: Our professional team works with respect and discretion, ensuring the preservation of your property during the intervention.

videAppartement.intro: Our apartment clearance service is perfectly adapted to smaller spaces and the specific constraints of buildings (elevators, stairs, etc.).
points: Quick intervention, ideal for end of lease
A team experienced in apartment clearance
Solutions adapted to access constraints
A complete service including dismantling if necessary
Eco-responsible waste management
videAppartement.conclusion: We guarantee a discreet and efficient service, respectful of your neighborhood and the common areas of the building.

videGrenier.intro: Our attic clearance service helps you free up your cluttered attics and storage spaces, often difficult to access.
points: Precise sorting of items that can be kept, recycled or thrown away
Management of heavy and bulky items
Secure access even in narrow areas
Eco-responsible waste treatment
videGrenier.conclusion: We ensure that your attic regains all its space, ready for new projects.

videLocaux.intro: We support businesses and professionals in clearing their premises, workshops, shops or warehouses.
points: Quick evacuation of obsolete furniture and equipment
Dismantling and heavy handling
Strict compliance with safety standards
Recycling and treatment adapted to professional waste
videLocaux.conclusion: We intervene in short timeframes to limit the impact on your activity.

videBureau.intro: Our office clearance service is intended for companies wishing to free up or reorganize their work spaces.
points: Office furniture clearance (chairs, tables, cabinets...)
Recovery and valuation of computer equipment
Selective sorting and responsible waste management
Discreet and organized intervention
videBureau.conclusion: We help you optimize your spaces while respecting your scheduling constraints.

nettoyage.intro: In addition to clearance, we offer cleaning services to make your spaces perfectly clean and ready for use.
points: Complete cleaning of floors and surfaces
Disinfection of sensitive areas
Dusting and window washing
Environmentally friendly products
nettoyage.conclusion: We adapt our intervention to your specific needs for an impeccable result.

company.description: Our company is what comes closest to perfection in terms of offering house clearance, attic clearance, apartment clearance services, etc.
